`OperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `GrossMargin` - `SumOfExpenses`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementSmall_PrtFST102Variables1_OperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementSmall_PrtFST102Variables1_OperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementSmall_PrtFST102Variables1_GrossMargin')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementSmall_PrtFST102Variables1_GrossMargin return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementSmall_PrtFST102Variables1_SumOfExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementSmall_PrtFST102Variables1_SumOfExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
